original_title: George Kambosos Jr. vs. Devin Haney
overview: George Kambosos Jr. vs Devin Haney, billed as Undisputed, was a lightweight unification professional boxing match contested between WBA, IBF, WBO, and The Ring champion, George Kambosos Jr, and WBC champion, Devin Haney.
title: George Kambosos Jr. vs. Devin Haney
